ygData.subject: Re: RebelYell tries to make contact.
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine glanced back at Spears and replied awe you ruin all my fun. he smiled toward Spears with a sarcastic grin. He was happy with the way things were

Lunarpine glanced back at Spears and replied "awe you ruin all my fun." he
smiled toward Spears with a sarcastic grin.

He was happy with the way things were going, he was finally busy doing
something more than fighting every pred that looked at him wrong. His repair
work was a shotty patchwork that would have made the creators of the Ark
roll in thier graves. It should hold long enough to get it back where it
belongs.


----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, August 13, 2000 11:28 AM
Subject: Re: RebelYell tries to make contact.


::Spears::

She sighed and walked out towards the entrance of the ship.  She
walked outside and saw Lunarpine. "Hey, Lunarpine, we got incoming
maximal.  With luck he's bringing stuff for us to use to repair the
ship.  So when he gets here, don't blast his face off."

She  sat on the ramp at the entrance and looked out and around the
ship.  She sighed, she was feeling like salvaging the Ark was an
impoosable task and could never be done.  She wanted it to come true
just as much as the next maximal.  But there was just too much damage.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> ::RebelYell::
> "Allright, Ive locked onto your signal. Ill see you
> soon." RebelYell walked over to the pod and salvaged
> as many parts as he could carry.Activating the jet
> pack on his back, he took off and headed in the
> direction of Spears' signal.
> --- logomorph@h... wrote:
> > ::Spears::
> >
> > She heard the message oveer her link. "Yeah I hear
> > you. Come on in
> > and we can talk. Just home in on the signal from my
> > transmission.I'm
> > at the ARK. Also, if you can bring anything from
> > pod, do so. We will
> > need it."
> >
> > She walked over to the bridge and looked at the
> > scematics of the
> > ship.  She shook her head.  It would take a miracle
> > to keep this ship
> > from falling apart.
> >
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> > <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > > :::RebelYell:::
> > >
> > >     RebelYell stood for a moment lost in his
> > thoughts
> > > as the snow fell around him. He decided that the
> > only
> > > thing to do is try the comm. "I just hope this
> > planet
> > > has a lot of Preds to slag" he thought. He opened
> > the
> > > com link and transmitted on all Maximal channels.
> > "Any
> > > Maximals that can hear me, my name is RebelYell
> > and Im
> > > here to join you. Please respond."
> > >
> > >
